bill.title: Rabbi Michoel Ber Weissmandl Congressional Gold Medal Act of 2019
bill.description: Orders the posthumous award of a Congressional Gold Medal to Rabbi Michoel Ber Weissmandl, in recognition of his acts of valor during World War II. The U.S. Mint may strike and sell duplicates in bronze.

history.action: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

subjects.subject_name: War crimes, genocide, crimes against humanity
